data.what_is: Dialog Insight is a customer engagement platform that empowers businesses to generate more customer touchpoints and build brand loyalty through the automation of personalization. The platform features a range of tools for creating and deploying campaigns, as well as analytics and reporting capabilities to track the success of those campaigns. Dialog Insight's key benefits include the ability to segment and target customer groups, automate and personalize communication, and optimize campaigns for maximum performance. Dialog Insight delivers a true 1:1 customer experience, targeting the right segment across all channels, and maximizing ROI while reducing cost and time.
data.product_description: Dialog Insight develops customer acquisition, data analysis and personalized communication solutions that can improve the effectiveness of your digital marketing programs.

features.name: Data Import & Export Tools
features.content: Ability to input, modify and extract data from the application in bulk through a structured file. This feature was mentioned in 14 Dialog Insight reviews.

features.name: Integration APIs
features.content: Application Programming Interface - Specification for how the application communicates with other software.  API's typically enable integration of data, logic, objects, etc with other software applications.

features.name: Breadth of Partner Applications
features.content: To what extent are there partner applications readily available for integrating into this product?  Partner applications typically provide complementary, best of breed functionality not offered natively in this product.

features.name: Customization
features.content: As reported in 12 Dialog Insight reviews. System provides sufficient customization to meet business requirements

features.name: Workflow Capability
features.content: Automates a process that requires a series of steps that typically require intervention by a several different users.  Administrators can write rules to determine who and when a user needs to complete a step.  Also includes notification of users when they need to take action.

features.name: User, Role, and Access Management
features.content: Grant access to select data, features, objects, etc. based on the users, user role, groups, etc. 12 reviewers of Dialog Insight have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Internationalization
features.content: Enables users to view and transact business with the same content in multiple languages and currencies.

features.name: Sandbox / Test Environments
features.content: As reported in 10 Dialog Insight reviews. Allows administrators to easily develop and test changes to the CRM deployment.  After changes are made admins can easily migrate the changes into the "live" or "production" environment.

features.name: Performance and Reliability
features.content: Software is consistently available (uptime) and allows users to complete tasks quickly because they are not waiting for the software to respond to an action they took.  12 reviewers of Dialog Insight have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Output Document Generation
features.content: Allows adminstrators to create templates that enable users to quickly generate dynamic documents in various formats based on the data stored in the application.

features.name: Building and Personalizing Emails
features.content: Based on 18 Dialog Insight reviews. Create and design emails with an editor; manage templates; personalize dynamically

features.name: Sending Outbound Emails
features.content: Create targeted lists, schedule and manage bulk email sending. This feature was mentioned in 12 Dialog Insight reviews.

features.name: Manage Email Deliverability
features.content: Ensure inbox delivery. Includes opt-in management, bounce handling, unsubscribe processing, suppression lists, email preview, spam checking, link validation, and delivery monitoring. This feature was mentioned in 15 Dialog Insight reviews.

features.name: Automated Email Responses
features.content: As reported in 12 Dialog Insight reviews. Set up automated nurturing emails based on events, online activities, and lead scores

features.name: Landing Pages and Forms
features.content: Based on 12 Dialog Insight reviews. Build customized landing pages and lead capture forms for specific marketing campaigns to maximize conversion and to capture the right qualifying information.

features.name: Dynamic Content
features.content: As reported in 14 Dialog Insight reviews. Dynamically customize emails, forms, and landing pages for specific segments of customers and prospects.

features.name: A/B Testing
features.content: Test alternate versions of emails, landing pages, and forms. Learn what works, maximize response rates, and increase conversion. This feature was mentioned in 13 Dialog Insight reviews.

features.name: Mobile Optimized
features.content: Based on 16 Dialog Insight reviews. Support mobile-optimized emails, online forms, and landing pages.

features.name: Search Tracking and Optimization
features.content: Track performance of keywords and links in major search engines.  Measure search rankings and performance.  Improve page-level SEO with tools to diagnose and improve page performance.  Integrate with Google AdWords.

features.name: Marketing Lead Database
features.content: A marketing lead database is the system of record for your most important marketing asset: your leads and contacts. Includes a view of all marketing interactions between each prospect and your company, including website visits, email clicks, scoring changes, and data updates/history.

features.name: Data Quality Management
features.content: Data quality consists of deduplication, cleansing, and appending your marketing database.

features.name: Segmentation
features.content: As reported in 11 Dialog Insight reviews. Segment your database and build list of target leads and contacts.  Filter on demographic and company attributes (title, company size, location) as well as behavioral filters and CRM information.

features.name: Lead Scoring and Grading
features.content: Automatically qualify and score leads based on demographics as well as prospect online behaviors, including recency and frequency. Assign your own weights to determine lead scores for prioritization.

features.name: Lead Nurturing
features.content: Automate drip marketing campaigns that send relevant messages over time, based on prospect behaviors and pre-defined campaign steps.

features.name: Online Behavior Tracking
features.content: As reported in 10 Dialog Insight reviews. Track which emails a prospect opens and clicks, what web-pages they visit, what keywords they use, even what they say on social networks.

features.name: Automated Alerts and Tasks
features.content: Create tasks automatically and provide real-time sales alerts over email, RSS or mobile device.

features.name: CRM Lead Integration
features.content: Sync lead, contact, account, and opportunity information with your CRM system.

features.name: Program ManagementView full feature definition
features.content: Manage marketing campaigns and programs across multiple channels, including online ads, video campaigns, mobile, virtual events, and social media. Create and optimize program assets such as landing pages, emails, campaigns, and lists. Track program objectives, results, and costs to assess the program ROI.

features.name: Event / Webinar Marketing
features.content: Streamline the entire event process, including personalized invitations, registration, reminders, and post-event follow-up.  Integrate with online meeting tools like WebEx, Adobe Connect, GoToWebinar.

features.name: Calendaring
features.content: Maintain a marketing calendar across multiple groups. Manage the calendar for the entire marketing department, from promotions to content to PR.

features.name: Social Sharing
features.content: Add intelligent social share buttons to your campaigns and content.  Track who is sharing your content and driving conversions.

features.name: Basic Reporting
features.content: Access pre-built and custom reports and dashboards to measure leads by source/campaign/month, email performance, landing page performance, and web and social activity. Create report subscriptions that can automatically send updates to your team and executives. 15 reviewers of Dialog Insight have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Web Analytics
features.content: Track which pages prospects and customers visit and how often they come back.  Capture the history in database for lead scoring and sales intelligence. Use anonymous company look-up to identify anonymous visitors.  Send alerts to sales reps of which of their prospects and customers web activity.

features.name: ROI Analytics
features.content: Measure leads, prospects generated, pipeline, revenue, investment, and ROI by marketing channel or program. The result is that you can see which marketing investments are generating the greatest return and get visibility into how marketing budget should be allocated going forward.

features.name: Revenue Analytics
features.content: Analyze how leads flow through the funnel by measuring stage to stage conversion rates and velocity.  Allocate pipeline and revenue credit among all the marketing activities that have successfully touched an opportunity as it moves through the pipeline.

features.name: Bulk SMS
features.content: Enables users to send mass text message campaigns

features.name: Text Scheduler
features.content: Provides the ability to schedule single or bulk text messages to recipients on a specific date and time

features.name: Automatic Replies
features.content: Provides automatic text message replies to recipients

features.name: Automatic URL Shortening
features.content: Provides automatic URL shortening to use less characters via text

features.name: Personalization
features.content: Offers features for personalizing text messages based on customer information or past behavior

features.name: Transactional SMS
features.content: Allows users to establish automated workflows and triggers to deliver transactional text messages

features.name: Data Enrichment
features.content: Uses external data sources to improve customer profiles.

features.name: Expandability
features.content: Can be updated to accept new sources and types of data.

features.name: Content Marketing
features.content: Can act as a content marketing platform.

features.name: Multiple Devices
features.content: Can engage with customers across any device with a consistent message.

features.name: Marketing Metrics
features.content: Provides analysis of marketing program ROI and efficiency.

features.name: Predictive Modeling
features.content: Predicts outcomes based on statistical models; can give insight to "what-if" scenarios.

features.name: Recommendation Engine
features.content: Uses artificial intelligence to provide suggestions based on desired outcomes.

features.name: Reporting
features.content: Provides pre-built or customizable performance reports

features.name: Automation
features.content: Automates tasks and features for added convenience

features.name: White Label
features.content: Offers a white labeling service for agencies or resellers to customize platform branding

features.name: Short Codes
features.content: Provides businesses with 5- to 6-digit short codes for running text marketing campaigns

features.name: API Integration
features.content: Facilitates the integration of text messaging into existing business applications through an SMS gateway API

initial_reviews.review_title: Plateforme facile d'utilisation et excellent service client
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Dialog Insight?
La plateforme est tres facile d'utilisation. Pas besoin d'etre un expert en web pour pouvoir faire des envois.  La directrice de compte est aussi tres receptive et reponds en general assez rapidement aux courriels. L'entreprise cherche toujours a innover ,ameliorer et diversifier ses services. Le support technique est #1! Finalement, c'est vraiment  agreable de pouvoir echanger  en francais.

What do you dislike about Dialog Insight?
Je trouve qu'il y a souvent des changements au niveau de l'affichage, qui semble etre developpes dans le but de rendre la plateforme plus facile d'utilisation, En tant qu'integrateur numerique, c'est quelque chose que je ne trouve pas necessaire. Je prefererais que l'investissement soit plutot mis dans l'amelioration des fonctionnalites deja presentes.

What problems is Dialog Insight solving and how is that benefiting you?
Dialog Insight accepte la plupart du temps nos demandes de developpements personnalises, ce qui nous permet de mieux repondre a nos besoins d'entreprise.

Je prefererais que l'investissement soit plutot mis dans l'amelioration des fonctionnalites deja presentes.

initial_reviews.review_title: A human platform that meets all our needs
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Dialog Insight?
Fast, friendly and efficient customer service. They are always available to help and advise us.

Account manager who listens to our needs, who can help us with our strategies. We don't feel alone, we feel that they are there to help us use the full potential of the platform for our needs.

Activity forms for registering for our webinars: we love all the functions attached to this.

Prospecting forms for downloading white papers: we use them a lot, with success.

What do you dislike about Dialog Insight?
Sometimes basic design function.

Need to sometimes rebuild blocks from one message/model to another.

What problems is Dialog Insight solving and how is that benefiting you?
Understanding our customers well, being able to segment precisely to send them the right communication at the right time. We are very satisfied.

Les fonctions de courriels et d'evenements sont mes preferees. Mais honnetement, tout va bien. La mise en page est facile, la gestion de la base de donnees aussi. Les fonctionnalites administratrice sont faciles. Et le service client est TOP!

What do you dislike about Dialog Insight?
L'integration a ete un defi et la mise en oeuvre de la base de donnee a ete coriace, mais ca se fait bien au final.

J'aimerais aussi pouvoir fusionner ou lier 2 profils ensembles (pour garder l'historique des deux comptes malgre un changement de courriel, ou un doublon).

What problems is Dialog Insight solving and how is that benefiting you?
Le plus gros : je dirais que souvent notre base de donnees DI est plus a jour que notre CRM (comme les abonnes peuvent mettre eux meme leurs infos a jour).

initial_reviews.review_title: Dialog Insight made it possible for us to integrate our data in a way that made us save time
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Dialog Insight?
First, we primarily use simple mail marketing features, and we love it.  The simple yet complete tools enabled us to improve our relationship with our community.  The second is all the data integration made possible by the APIs.  This integration keeps our data in sync with our IT ecosystem.  Finally, the support team is fantastic with their fast and accurate responses.

What do you dislike about Dialog Insight?
As of right now, we don't use 100% of its capabilities, and in the future, we may encounter some things we dislike worth mentioning, but almost everything is good.  The only possible improvement would be a simpler and faster API.  Initially, our developers had to get accustomed to Dialog Insight APIs.  What's more, the APIs could process a little faster.  But still, it took about two weeks to build a syncing gateway that works just fine!

What problems is Dialog Insight solving and how is that benefiting you?
The first and significant improvement for us is that with data syncing, all the pertinent data used to get in touch with our community sits in one place.  Before Dialog Insight, we had to regroup information across different sources whenever we needed to contact our community.  Right now, the data's always up-to-date in Dialog Insight, and the users can focus on what's important: content!

initial_reviews.review_title: Dialog Insight paltefrome & Team
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Dialog Insight?
Dialog Insight platform is a complete CRM platform with multiple Modules, which offers personalized experiences at Every Step of the Customer Lifecycle (Acquisition, Retention, loyalty and eCom).

The user-friendly tool offers 100% autonomy to clients who desire to create and execute their campaigns.

Dialog Insight Team works with their client as a partner rather than a provider. The expert team provides strategic help from planification to executing each project and campaign.

During the last 11 years, I have worked with Dialog Insight Platform in different companies.

What do you dislike about Dialog Insight?
I love everything about "Dialog Insight" tool and team.

What problems is Dialog Insight solving and how is that benefiting you?
It happens that our company added a new eCom platform to our website. Dialog Insight creates the connector to plug the data of the new platform into the Data Base.

As RGPD started in Europe, Dialog Insight was ahead of time and helped us comply with this new law.

initial_reviews.review_title: A great marketing SaaS, with actual people you can talk to!
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Dialog Insight?
The DI works excellent for doing complex marketing email campaigns. One of the benefits is being able to link it to your products and users databases to make personalized emails. I also like that the team is available to help when needed, and they are super available and friendly.

What do you dislike about Dialog Insight?
Nothing that I dislike, but one should note that advanced customizations may require the DialogInsight's team. As end users, we do not always have access to some of the power options available in the platform.

What problems is Dialog Insight solving and how is that benefiting you?
Sending thousands of customized emails that include some fixed, editorial items, preference-based items, and finally, algorithmically recommended items.

initial_reviews.review_title: Plus qu'une solution technologique, Dialog Insight est un precieux partenaire
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Dialog Insight?
Au-dela de la plateforme et de ses fonctionnalites, la valeur ajoutee de DI reside chez les responsables de notre compte et analystes d'affaires qui ont a coeur notre succes. Ils vont au devant de nos besoins et il y a beaucoup de richesse dans le fait qu'ils nous accompagnent depuis des annees et connaissent nos systemes qui sont en constante evolution.

Des conseillers marketing de firmes externes nous disent souvent que, pour la taille d'entreprise que nous sommes, nous avons la chance grace a DI d'avoir recours a cette << artillerie lourde >> a laquelle des entreprises plus grandes que nous n'ont meme pas acces!

What do you dislike about Dialog Insight?
Pour tirer le maximum du potentiel de la plateforme de Dialog Insight, il faut etre pret a s'investir dans le developpement du projet et la maitrise de la plateforme.

What problems is Dialog Insight solving and how is that benefiting you?
Une fois que nous avons eu integre les outils de Dialog Insight a notre site transactionnel, nous avons veritablement actionne les leviers du marketing relationnel (communications personnalisees en fonction des preferences, parcours client, panier oublie, invitation a donner une recommandation sur un produit 30 jours apres l'achat, etc.).

A elle seule, tout la question de la gestion des constements tacite et explicite, en fonction de la Loi anti-pourriel, procurer une paix d'esprit non negligeable.

L'integration a ete un defi et la mise en oeuvre de la base de donnee a ete coriace, mais ca se fait bien au final.

J'aimerais aussi pouvoir fusionner ou lier 2 profils ensembles (pour garder l'historique des deux comptes malgre un changement de courriel, ou un doublon).

What problems is Dialog Insight solving and how is that benefiting you?
Le plus gros : je dirais que souvent notre base de donnees DI est plus a jour que notre CRM (comme les abonnes peuvent mettre eux meme leurs infos a jour).

all_reviews.review_title: Dialog Insight made it possible for us to integrate our data in a way that made us save time
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Dialog Insight?
First, we primarily use simple mail marketing features, and we love it.  The simple yet complete tools enabled us to improve our relationship with our community.  The second is all the data integration made possible by the APIs.  This integration keeps our data in sync with our IT ecosystem.  Finally, the support team is fantastic with their fast and accurate responses.

What do you dislike about Dialog Insight?
As of right now, we don't use 100% of its capabilities, and in the future, we may encounter some things we dislike worth mentioning, but almost everything is good.  The only possible improvement would be a simpler and faster API.  Initially, our developers had to get accustomed to Dialog Insight APIs.  What's more, the APIs could process a little faster.  But still, it took about two weeks to build a syncing gateway that works just fine!

What problems is Dialog Insight solving and how is that benefiting you?
The first and significant improvement for us is that with data syncing, all the pertinent data used to get in touch with our community sits in one place.  Before Dialog Insight, we had to regroup information across different sources whenever we needed to contact our community.  Right now, the data's always up-to-date in Dialog Insight, and the users can focus on what's important: content!

all_reviews.review_title: Dialog Insight paltefrome & Team
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Dialog Insight?
Dialog Insight platform is a complete CRM platform with multiple Modules, which offers personalized experiences at Every Step of the Customer Lifecycle (Acquisition, Retention, loyalty and eCom).

The user-friendly tool offers 100% autonomy to clients who desire to create and execute their campaigns.

Dialog Insight Team works with their client as a partner rather than a provider. The expert team provides strategic help from planification to executing each project and campaign.

During the last 11 years, I have worked with Dialog Insight Platform in different companies.

What do you dislike about Dialog Insight?
I love everything about "Dialog Insight" tool and team.

What problems is Dialog Insight solving and how is that benefiting you?
It happens that our company added a new eCom platform to our website. Dialog Insight creates the connector to plug the data of the new platform into the Data Base.

As RGPD started in Europe, Dialog Insight was ahead of time and helped us comply with this new law.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Dialog Insight?
The DI works excellent for doing complex marketing email campaigns. One of the benefits is being able to link it to your products and users databases to make personalized emails. I also like that the team is available to help when needed, and they are super available and friendly.

What do you dislike about Dialog Insight?
Nothing that I dislike, but one should note that advanced customizations may require the DialogInsight's team. As end users, we do not always have access to some of the power options available in the platform.

What problems is Dialog Insight solving and how is that benefiting you?
Sending thousands of customized emails that include some fixed, editorial items, preference-based items, and finally, algorithmically recommended items.

all_reviews.review_title: Plus qu'une solution technologique, Dialog Insight est un precieux partenaire
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Dialog Insight?
Au-dela de la plateforme et de ses fonctionnalites, la valeur ajoutee de DI reside chez les responsables de notre compte et analystes d'affaires qui ont a coeur notre succes. Ils vont au devant de nos besoins et il y a beaucoup de richesse dans le fait qu'ils nous accompagnent depuis des annees et connaissent nos systemes qui sont en constante evolution.

Des conseillers marketing de firmes externes nous disent souvent que, pour la taille d'entreprise que nous sommes, nous avons la chance grace a DI d'avoir recours a cette << artillerie lourde >> a laquelle des entreprises plus grandes que nous n'ont meme pas acces!

What do you dislike about Dialog Insight?
Pour tirer le maximum du potentiel de la plateforme de Dialog Insight, il faut etre pret a s'investir dans le developpement du projet et la maitrise de la plateforme.

What problems is Dialog Insight solving and how is that benefiting you?
Une fois que nous avons eu integre les outils de Dialog Insight a notre site transactionnel, nous avons veritablement actionne les leviers du marketing relationnel (communications personnalisees en fonction des preferences, parcours client, panier oublie, invitation a donner une recommandation sur un produit 30 jours apres l'achat, etc.).

A elle seule, tout la question de la gestion des constements tacite et explicite, en fonction de la Loi anti-pourriel, procurer une paix d'esprit non negligeable.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Dialog Insight?
Dialog Insight allows us to produce professional marketing campaigns which are at the heart of our operations. The reporting tools provide valuable feedback. The support team is very responsive.

What do you dislike about Dialog Insight?
Initially, we had to have custom functions built to achieve the desired results. Most of these have since been integrated into the basic tool.

What problems is Dialog Insight solving and how is that benefiting you?
We can pinpoint which contacts to send our campaigns to based on their interactions with our website, with our marketing campaigns and other variables. Automation of scenarios creates a better customer experience while freeing internal resource time.

all_reviews.review_title: Great reliable business partners
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Dialog Insight?
Dialog Insight has been a great partner for the last 10 years. They don't say no; they analyze the needs and find solutions to make it work. They are one of our most reliable partners, we can always count on them.

What do you dislike about Dialog Insight?
We are using their platform to an extended point. We sometimes reach the limit of what is feasible. But their product development team is working hard to make our projects come to life.

What problems is Dialog Insight solving and how is that benefiting you?
Dialog insight allows us to aggregate all of our users' data in the same platform and use it for segmentation and automation at a much more affordable cost than bigger platforms and with more human interactions. Their strategic insights help us make the best decisions and increase our database subscribers.

all_reviews.review_title: Great business, user friendly platform and exceptional service!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Dialog Insight?
The service from the support/ analysts/ account managers is simply incredible! They always respond in a very reasonable delay and are always there to support us and find solutions to our problems or wishes.
User-friendly platform ever for our colleagues that are less tech-savy
Infinite possibilities for integrations

What do you dislike about Dialog Insight?
Some parts are a little but technical and require a better technical component knowledge than some other platforms, but the analysts are always there to help. That said, once you've been using the platform for a while, it gets very easy to use and understand.

What problems is Dialog Insight solving and how is that benefiting you?
Data centralization  (DMP)
Email segmentation and automation (everything looks possible)
Customer consent center  (RCU)
Easy email integration and scheduling
Content management for emails

all_reviews.review_title: Great app with flexible data schemes
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Dialog Insight?
The stored data is not limited to simple columns like Campaign Monitor or Mailchimp. This allows great opportunities and flexibility for segmentation, statistics, whitelists, etc. Great value with good tools. Simplier and so much cheaper than SalesForce Marketing Cloud.

What do you dislike about Dialog Insight?
The template designer is not the greatest (feels old a little), but it will allow you to do whatever you want.

What problems is Dialog Insight solving and how is that benefiting you?
Dialog Insight allows us to use a lot of personalization and segmentation to have good fundraising solicitation emails. It can support all the data needed to meet our goals. The support team is easily available in English and French. Dialog Insight can also do the job for you ($).

all_reviews.review_title: Dialog Insight - ehh its ok
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Dialog Insight?
Not sure really. They seem new at this business but are willing to develop. Their staff is responsive and are a pleasure to work with.

What do you dislike about Dialog Insight?
You have to pay for everything. Zero free customer support. Any automation outside of auto-responder, you have to pay their development team to create it for you at $100/hour. Any time you have a question about a certain functionality, you are charged for emailing or calling them. Their staff is very nice and responsive, however, if you are in the U.S., be prepared for a language barrier.

Recommendations to others considering Dialog Insight:
Would like them to experience functionality of other ESPs so they know what their competition is like.

What problems is Dialog Insight solving and how is that benefiting you?
We had problems with deliverability at our previous ESP which used a shared IP. Dialog Insight allows you to use a dedicated IP (like most enterprise level ESPs). Our deliverability increased dramatically.
